sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_ollama_genai_prompt"> <x_snc_ollama_genai_prompt action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <apitype>command</apitype> <model>gemma:2b</model> <prompt>Why is sky not Red ?</prompt> <python_script_name>c:\python\OllamaLangchain.py</python_script_name> <response>The word "why" is a question word that is used to ask why something happened or to explain a cause and effect. It is often used in conjunction with other words, such as "because" or "so," to provide a logical explanation.</response> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-05-10 16:59:34</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d7942cda0d8e02107f44057211099c49</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-10 17:01:20</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_ollama_genai_prompt> </record_update>
